author: Shaun M
title: Lil Uzi Vert Gives Props To Young Thug, Kodak Black, XXXTENTACION & Others
text:
Home > Music > Lil Uzi Vert Gives Props To Young Thug, Kodak Black, XXXTENTACION & Others Lil Uzi Vert Gives Props To Young Thug, Kodak Black, XXXTENTACION & Others 0 0 Posted by Shaun M , Feb 21, 2017 at 03:50pm Lil Uzi Vert showed some love for the younger generation of rappers Tuesday. 
Recently discovered by mainstream media thanks to the success of "Bad and Boujee," Lil Uzi Vert took to Twitter Tuesday to shout out some rappers form the younger generation. 
The Philly rapper kept it southern. He gave props a fresh crop that includes Florida's Lil Pump, Kodak Black , Ski Mask The Slump God and XXXTENTACION, Atlanta's 21 Savage , Playboi Carti, Hoodrich Pablo Juan, the legend Young Thug , SahBabii and Kodie Shane, and Houston's Ugly God. 
â€œIâ€™m in both s my Young niggas need more credit I fuck wit yâ€™all and thatâ€™s all dat matters â€¦ keep Flexing . # luvisrage2 ,â€ Uzi tweeted on Twitter to express the respect he feels for those up-and-comers. many of them replied messages of gratitude. 
Lil Uzi is currently on tour with The Weeknd and Bryson Tiller in Scandinavia. "People were deliberately trying to hurt me all of the time." Lil Uzi Vert showed some love for the younger generation of rappers Tuesday. 
Recently discovered by mainstream media thanks to the success of "Bad and Boujee," Lil Uzi Vert took to Twitter Tuesday to shout out some rappers form the younger generation. 
The Philly rapper kept it southern. He gave props a fresh crop that includes Florida's Lil Pump, Kodak Black , Ski Mask The Slump God and XXXTENTACION, Atlanta's 21 Savage , Playboi Carti, Hoodrich Pablo Juan, the legend Young Thug , SahBabii and Kodie Shane, and Houston's Ugly God. 
â€œIâ€™m in both s my Young niggas need more credit I fuck wit yâ€™all and thatâ€™s all dat matters â€¦ keep Flexing . # luvisrage2 ,â€ Uzi tweeted on Twitter to express the respect he feels for those up-and-comers. many of them replied messages of gratitude. 
Lil Uzi is currently on tour with The Weeknd and Bryson Tiller in Scandinavia. Check out some of the tweets below.
